greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The absolute direction (0=east, 1=south, 2=west, 3=north) of the Peano curve A163336 at point n.
comment: Taking every ninth term gives the same sequence: (and similarly for all higher powers of 9 as well): a(n) = a(9*n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..6561
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 01 2009
